# archestra_dual_llm_config (Data Source)

Fetches a Dual LLM Security Config by ID.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "archestra_dual_llm_config" "example" {
  id = "config-id-here"
}

output "main_agent_prompt" {
  value = data.archestra_dual_llm_config.example.main_agent_prompt
}

output "config_enabled" {
  value = data.archestra_dual_llm_config.example.enabled
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Dual LLM Config identifier. Either id or name must be provided. Note: Name-based lookup is not currently supported by the API.
- `name` (String) Name of the Dual LLM Config. Either id or name must be provided. Note: Name filtering is not currently supported by the API, so this field is reserved for future use. Please use `id` instead.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the config was created
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the dual LLM config is enabled
- `main_agent_prompt` (String) Prompt for the main agent
- `max_rounds` (Number) Maximum number of rounds
- `quarantined_agent_prompt` (String) Prompt for the quarantined agent
- `summary_prompt` (String) Prompt for the summary
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the config was last updated
